Standard

                

Underweight (BMI range:16.0-18.5)
If your BMI is under 16, that means Severely Underweight.
An advice for underweight people is to take some healthy high-energy food.
Healthy Weight (BMI range:18.5-25.0)
Awesome! Continue to keep in good health!
Overweight (BMI range:25.0-30.0)
If you want to keep fit, then don't diet. Just eat healthy and exercise.
Obese (BMI range:30.0-35.0)
If your BMI is larger than 40.0, that means Extremely Obese. That is not a good sign
Obese is a problem. And the health problems it causes make it even more of a problem.

Metric

Awesome! Continue to keep in good health！
Overweight (BMI range:23.0-24.9)
